name: how do we teach the agent that the gold glitters
description:
not really "teach" but represent it. if the agent isn't going to see everything, well it should acknowledge it's other senses; the fact that we cannot see a room with gold, but glittering means that a room with gold is nearby.

possible solution: mark all the adjacent rooms with "has gold" and give the link some uncertainty
we can use the link uncertainty as something to explore; we need to remove the invalid links once we know where the gold is
